text: HealtH (also known as Health and H.E.A.L.T.H.) is a 1980 American comedy movie directed by Robert Altman and stars Carol Burnett, Glenda Jackson, James Garner, Lauren Bacall, Paul Dooley, Alfre Woodard, Dick Cavett, Dinah Shore. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was never released on home video. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 comedy movies Category:1980 LGBT movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Altman
title: Health (movie)
